A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The only think enjoyable about this movie was the visual effects. It failed in every aspect of storytelling. There are a plethora of plot holes. The themes don't jive with the characters. Half the actions taken by characters don't make sense\, or don't fit with the character. Luke's part in this movie was wasted. This movie actually ruined star wars for me. My expectations for Episode IX are 3/10
